description:
Craig is from Florida.
"It's hot as hell," he said. "But I love it."
He's 24 and he works at a boutique hotel in South Beach.
"Man, there are so many hot women there," he said.
Apparently, the MILFs come to check in and get a little more than a room.
"I love to flirt with them," Craig said. "Sometimes they'll invite me up to their room after I get off. It's a lot of fun."
I bet his baby face gets him a lot of play!
title: Craig
